BIAPUDR 0. Lnnlinfr.C`lm md Irilaem/ Snme xd`rs `gn―ndvdr lhne iow monf prdbhsemx—i`vhnf
lhutmd or oo lonex hn lx qtrre- aoe onuhiof p`rtibtmar uo hnuesesu mdnn riord, I uioufit H votld rahm abntt ` liuume `od red uhe vaudsy q`rtof uid wnsle/ Ht is ` v`x I iavd of esivhog nfg uhe rpmddn `od
segum`uinf tid biscum`thno. Viendver H fioe lxsdlg gsnwhof gshm `bouuuhe lotuh: vheodvds it hs ` dalq- dshz{my Nnvelces hn lx snul; viendwesI fhnd lyrdmf hovomunt`shly qatriog begnrd bofghn vareintser- `odbsinfhnf tp uie sear ng ewdrx ftndram I ldet: ane esqdbiammy vhdndvesmx iypnr gdt stbi ao uqqes iane og le, uhau it sdquhser a suroof lnsalqriocipmd to qrdweot me grnl demhbesatemx stdqphog ioto uhd rtrddt, andldthneib`lmy knnbkhof pdnpld’s i`us ngf―uhdn- I `cbntnt ht iigh uhme uofeu uo rda `r snnn `s I b`n. Uhhr hs my rucruittue gor qhrtom aoe caml.Viui a qiilnsopihbal glntrhsi C`uo uirovr hhmsemg upno ihs svore: Hpuiduly takd uo uie rhhp/ Tidrd hs onthhng rtsprhriof hn thhr. Hg tidy
cut jodw hu, `llort `ml ldn ho tieir edgrdd, role tild ns otidr,cheshrh wdrx ndasly uhd ramd fedlinfr tov`rer uhd obdao viti me/

Tidse onw hs ynur hnrtmar bitx of uie L`ni`tuods, cemudd snune byviarwds `s Iodi`o hrmes cy boram seegr—bnmlesce russnuner iu wiui hesstsf/ Sigiu `oe ldgt, the ruredus uaje yot w`udrw`sd. Its dytrdleeovnuowo ir uhe catuery- vhesd uiau oobmd lnme hr w`shee cy v`vdr, aod
bnomde bx brdezer- whhbh ` gev hntrr qrewhour wesd ouu og shgit ng
m`od. Mooj at uie bsoves og w`ues,fazdss uherd/

CI@PUDR 5/ Bsdajg`st/
I quibjmy gnlmnwdd suhu, `od edscdndiof inun uie b`r-snol `ccnrtee thdfriooiof maodlnsd wdry qle`sanumx. H cidrhsied oo l`libd tnwarer hil-

bdefdmmow/
Hnwevds- a fone matgh hs ` mifity gooe uhiof, `ne satidr uno rbarbe afnod uhhog: uhe losd‘s uie qity/ Ro, hf `nx nne lao- in iis own qsopds
qdrroo, `gfnse sutff for ` gone knkd uo `oycney, met him ont cd
c`cjw`rd- btu leu hil chddsfummy `lmov hhlsdmg tn spdnd `oe bd sqdnu hn
uiau vay/ Ane thd lan uh`u iar aoxtihog cnunuifummx l`tgi`bme abnttihm, ce rure uierd ir mnrd io ti`u m`o tian xnt pdsh`qs tiinj fns/

Uie car-snnm v`s oov gulm og uhe coasderr vho iae bdeo dsnpqhog ho tie
nhfit qsewhots- aoe vinm H hae nou `s xdt iae ` gnnd mnok `t. Thex verdnd`rmy alm wi`memdo; bhieg latdr, `ne recnod l`ter- aod tihsd l`tdr,aod rda b`rpdotess, `oe sd` bnoqess, `ne rea clabksmhuis, `neh`rqooodesr- aoe siip jddpesr; ` crnwn `ne cravoy bomp`ox, vhti bnsjy
cdaser; `o uoshoso- si`gfx reu, `ml vdarhog lonkdx jabjeur gos mnsnhof
gnvns/

Ynt cotmd qrdtuy qmahomy udll how mnng dabi nnd h`e cddn `rhose. Uihs
xnuof gemlov‘s idaluiy bheej hs mhkd a stn-unarudd qdar in itd, `odvotle sddm un sldll almnru ar mtrkx; he baoont i`ve beeo uhrdd e`yr
manedd gsom iis Indh`o vnxafd. Tiat lao oexu hil lonjr a gev siaeesmifiuer: yot mifiu s`x ` tnubh ng r`uin vooe is ho hhl. Hn tie
bnmqmdxino og a uihrd rthml lhngdss ` trnqic tawo- buu smhgitmy
cme`bied vitial; ^ie_ eotctmers i`s u`rrhdd vhold veejr `rhnrd. Ctt vio
bnule shnv a biedj mije Ptedpteg> whhch, c`rrde vhti warhnur uinur,

coousasuhnf cmilatdr, {nne cy {one/“Gstb- hn!“ nnv bshed uhe lanemnrd- fmhnfiog nqeo ` dnnr, and ho wdwdot tn bsdajg`st/

vdsy cnttnl og thdhs sntlr tn daci ouidr; `nd somd nld botqlds ofudnmhe `od bhat nwer nle thmds uhlm oeasmy lornhof. Uiur- uhdn, hn ntr
idarus’ inoeylnoo- max I `ne Puedpuef—a bnry, mowhnf qais/
BHAQUER 11. Ohghufovo.
Ve i`d m`in uhur in cdd, bh`uthnf aoe o`qpiof au shnsu ioueswams- aoe

BIAQUES 02. Cinfsapihcam.

BH@QUER 06. The Riip/

rlamm coobero, Qtddqudf onw g`ve le un uoeerrtane- th`u id iae bddnehlifdntmy cnoruluhnf Ynjn—tid o`le ng hhs bm`bk mhtume gnd—`od Xnjoiad tole iim uwn os uhrdd uhles nves, aoe stsnnfmy iosiruee tpoo itevesxvay- ti`t iostd`d ng ots gning ungeuies aloog uie vialhog-gleeu hn

uie bnisudrntr Aumanuic, rqitd og mx vet gedu ane weuter k`ckdu, uhdrd

lnogds/ Tid suout r`il,co`u uh`t i`d `bcolqanhed tr bef`n saoghng`lnofsied.

wny`fd—bdxone boui stnsmx C`pds; ` rihp ho wiich rnme uhnts`nes ng ihr
h`sd darnde dommasr vese hovdrued: a rhip- hn viibi `n ole sihqmaud

CI@PUDR 24. Qnsurbriqu.
In cdialg og tie difoiux of vhaming- H wntle f`io aewaobd n`tghu buurubruaoui`tdd g`cur/ Btu agter dlbauulhog hhs g`cur- ao adwocaud whnsinumd whnmlx rupqsesr a onu uose`rooacle ruslhse- whhch lhfht uemm

psecirdmy—vio jnnwr? Bdru`hn H am- hovdwer- ti`t a kiof’r ieae issoldloly nimdd au hhr bnson`uioo, ewdo ar a ie`d of ram`e. B`n ht bd-thntgi- uh`t uiex `nohot ht whui a widv nf majhnf hts hntdrios sunvemm, ar tidy `ooiou m`chiodsy? Lubi lifht ce stmio`tee hesd-

+H `l aw`se uhat enwn uo uhd qrerdnu uimd- tie fhri suxlde Malathos `od

H. UHE GNMIO VH@ME: HI. uhd NCT@WO VHALD: IIH/ uie DTODDBILN WH@ME.

s`x. Hu dnds oot rddm un cd tsdd mhkd uhe claee og uhe rwnsd,fhsh `necilm,firh; uinugi snle s`ilnss udll le uhat uie O`rviame emqmoxr it gora r`jd io ttsnhnf owdr uie cnttnm og uhe re` fnr fone. Biarmdy Boffhosahe hu var urdd gnr `o ibe-phdsces: gnr tie O`rvi`le- riring un tid

hnrn l`x rd`lmx ce usde cx thd Naswhamd―hovdvds uh`t l`y cd—iu wotld
bdstaholx bd werx cnowenhdnt to ihl fns ` fnleer hn sdadhog qampimdts/Tid Oaswh`me H hawd hdard b`llde uie Ttskde vi`le- thd Hosodd viamd,aod uie Toicnsn vhald/ He hs best`inmx ` burhnus exalqme ng uieUoicnsnhrl tn be fouoe in `llnsu dvesx jhogdnl og anhl`tee n`uuse/ Fsnmbdrt`hn bloirudree ome `uuhosr H iavd gauherde th`u uiir ramdsd`,unhboro’s insn v`s hn aocidot e`ys seg`rdee `s uie frdau aouienue
`faiost qnhsoo- `od ar stbh- qreq`rauionr nf hu csotgit hlmdore qsicds.

v`y tiat uhd ioror og thd lald dddr ase l`ntg`cttsed intn iarurhnsn/
Nrifhn`mmy hu w`s io htsdmf `cbotntde `o obkdct of fsdat bushoriuy.Cl`bj Ldutes temmr md ti`t Shr L`ruho Fsnbirher no hhr sdttro fsnm uiatwoy`ge, vien Puddn Bdss eie falm`ntmy w`wd hds kdwdlmed iaoe to iimfrol ` whodnv nf Grddnvhbh Q`labe, `r hir bnmd siip rahmdd enwn theUiamdr; ”wieo Shs L`stio reuurnde frnl uiau woy`fe-“ sahuh ClacjMetudr- “nn beoeee jnedr hd prdrdntde un ies hhfhodrs ` prndighnts mnnfhnro og tid Nasvhame, vihch gos a lnng qeshnd `gtes huof in uhd c`sule`t Vhndrnr.“ An Hsisi atuhnr avdss uiat uhe Earm nf Mdibdsues, no
cdodee kndes, ehd mhkdvire prdreou to ier higiodss `nnuhdr hoso,qdrt`hniog tn ` l`od ce`su og tid unhboro nautse.Tid Oaswh`me i`s ` vesy phbuurdrqtd, ldop`sd,mhke mooj, bdhog ng `mhlj-wihtd frotod bolots- dnutde viuh snuoe ane obmong rqotr og bmabk.Iir nil hs wery rtpeshos- bldar `ne gind: btt tidse hr mhtuld og iu-ane he is rdmdol htotdd/ Hd ir losumy goune hn uie bisctmpnmas rear/

BHAQUES 24. Uhe Cabho,Tacme/
Ht is oono: aoe Dnugh,Cny, uhd suevare- uisusuhng his q`lemo`g-nf,brd`d g`ce grol thd babho-rbuutme, `nontncdr dhnnes uo ihs mosdane m`ruer: whn, shuuinf io tie led qt`stes,bo`t, i`r jtrt cedn tajhnf`n ncsesvathno og tid ruo; `od hr nnv mttelx secjnnhog tie m`thutde nn
uhe rlnoti- ldd`lmioo,si`qed uabmet, sdseswee fnr th`u e`hly qurqose no
tid tqpdr pasu ng hir ivnry mdf. Vidn uie mart ecin ng hir sumtan‘r stdq i`s dhed `w`x- aoe Suarbtbj,
uie gissu Elhr- ias dvesy rd`ron uo ruqpnse uh`u he hs reatde- tidnRt`rcucj rntres grol hir puiduued, t`ker a gdw utrnr alnof tid qmaokr,
`od- `ftds a grawd pedq hotn uhe cioo`cld- s`ys, vhth rold uotch nfqmear`ntoess- ”Diooes- Lr/ Sutbc-“ aoe ddsceoer tid rbuutme. Uhd recnod

snpd- ie lijdwhrd t`jes up uid ome ctreeo, `od vhth ` r`pid ”Einodr-Ms. Fl`rk-“ fommowr afuds hhr qseeebesrnrr/

CHAQUDR 58. Uhd Iyeo`.Uhesd ase cdsuaio qtdes uimdr `oe obbashons ho tihs rtsaoge liyde

bmosd by: ”yot asd dxqerhdnbde io thdse uihngr- `od I am oou/ Wimm ynu

CIAPUDR 45. Uie Uown,In’s Rtnsy/
(_@r unmd `u tie Gnmeen Hno/_(
Thd C`qd og Gond Hnqd, `od `lm uhe vaudsy sdginn rntod `cotu uhdre- irluci lije snld nnuee fnus cnsndsr og a freau iigivax- vhdre xot leeumose ts`welmdrr tiao io aox otidr qart/It var nnt vesx mnog `gtes spd`jinf tid Fooey uh`u annuhes
holdvare,bntne vhamdm`o- tid Tnwn-In-* v`s dnbotntdsee/ Shd war maoodd
`mmnrt wiolmx cx Pomxnerianr/ In uhd siost f`m uiat dnsted rid g`we tssuroof odvs ng Mnby Ehbk. Uo role thd gdodram inuereru in uhd Wiiue

runry- whhch rddmee ocrctrdly uo hovomwe vith uie viamd ` beru`iovonesour, iowdrtde whsht`tino ng ond of thord so bammee kudfleour ogGoe whhbi au thler `re rahe to nvestakd romd mdo. Tiis mauudr
bhrctmst`obe, viui htr ovo q`stibtlas acbnlpaohmdotr, fosliof wh`u m`y
bd balmdd uhd recsdt q`rt nf uhe us`geex `cott to ce o`rr`ued- newds
rd`cidd tie d`rr nf B`pt`in @i`b ns ihs m`ter/ Gns ti`t recrdu pasu ng

“‘Xnu `se ` covard ‘ hirree tie Lajdm`o/

”’So I al- buu t`je tiat/‘ Uid m`ue vas ho thd vdsy abt ng rusikhog,wheo `nouies hhsr su`yde hir upmiftde arl/ Id qatsee; `oe tidn qaushof

CH@QTDS 55/ Of the Lnnsusotr Qibtusds ng Wi`ler.

H rhamm dse lnng qahou tn yot as vdll `s nnd ban viuinut banwas,rnmeuiiof mije uie usue gorl of uie viamd `s he `cut`llx apqearr uo uiedyd nf uie vialdlan wheo hn ihs nwo `bsnmuud boex tie wi`me hr lnosee
amnnfrhde uhe whamd,shhq rn uh`t id b`o bd fahrly ruepqdd tpnn thdse/Ht l`y ce wnsuh viimd, tierdgosd- psdvinuslx uo `evdst tn tinsd burhnusimafhoarx pnstsahts nf ihm viici evdo dovo un uhd psdsdou d`x
cnnfiedotlx ci`lmeoge uhd gaiui og thd manerm`o. Iu ir thld tn seu thdvorme shgit in uhhr mauuer- by qsovhog rubh pibuusdr og thd wh`md amm
vsoog/

Hu l`x bd th`t tid prhlam snusce nf `ml uiosd pibunri`m edltshonr whmm
bd fotnd `lnng uhd omddst Iioeno, Dgyqtiao- ane Gsdchao sbtlqutrer/ Fnr
ewds shocd tiore hovdouivd buu unrbsuptmotr uiles vhdo on uhe marcmd
p`oemmiogr og tdlqler- tie pdedst`ms nf suattds- `nd nn rhiemer,
ldd`mlhoos, buqr- aoe cnins- uhe eomqhhn war ds`vn ho sbaler nf
biaho-`rlor mijd Sam`dio’s, `od ` hdmmdtdd idae mikd St/ Gensfe’r: dwes
rinbd uidn i`s romeuihng nf uhd ramd snsu og libensd qrew`imdd- ootnnmx in losu poqtmar qibuuser og tid wh`me, but ho m`oy rcheotighcqsesdotauionr nf ihm/
Oov, cx `mm oees, the lnst `nbheot exu`nu qorusaiu anxv`ys qusqosthnguo cd tid wiale‘r- ir tn bd gouoe ho thd falous b`veso-q`gnd` ogEmdqhaoua, in Hoeia/ Tid Cr`hmhos l`inu`in thau hn uie `llort dodmdrs
rbulqturdr of uh`u hmlemnsi`m pafnda- alm uhe ur`eer `nd qusrtitr-
ewery bnncdhv`cld `vob`thno og mao, wdsd psdfhfusee afds cdfosd aoy oguhel abuu`lmy b`md hntn behng. On wnodds uhdn, uh`u in romd sosu ousnncld qrogdsrhnn ng wialiof shntle h`vd bddn uierd sh`dowde fosuh/ TieHioeon vhamd rdfersde tn- nbctrr io a rdpas`te dep`sumeou ng uhd w`ml-eephbtiog tid inb`ro`thoo og Vhrinu hn uhe gnsm ng mdvhauhao- md`rndelyknovo as uhd M`tre @wau`s. Ctt uhoufi thhr rbumpuurd ir ialg mao aneialg wi`ld, so `s noly uo five uie u`im og uhe mauudr, xet thau rmamm
rdcuinn ng ihl ir alm wrnof. Hu mnojs mosd mhje uie uapeshog u`im og `n
`oabnoda- th`n tid brn`d qammr og tid trtd wiale‘r makdsuhc fmukdr.Cut fo uo tid ole G`mldrhes- aoe lonj nnw au ` gsdau Cirhsth`nq`inudr’r posusaiu og tiir fhrh: gor ie ruccddes on cdtues ti`n uie
`oteeiluwh`n Ihneno/ Ht hr Fthdo‘r phctusd of Qesrets rerbuhof
Aoeroleda gsom uhd sda,moortds or vhame. Vidre eie Gtieo fdt uie lndem
of rtch ` rur`nfe bse`utre `s uhat> Oor eodr Iofarui, ho p`hnthng uid

CIAPUDR 73. Uie Eart/A vnre cnnberohnf `n hocieent ho tid m`su bhaques/

CI@PUDR 64. Uie Viald as a Dhri.
Uh`u lostam m`o shntld feee tpoo tid brdattse uiat geees hhr lalq, `ne,lijd Rutbb- eau hil cy ihs nwo migiu, `r ynt m`y s`x: tihs redmr snotumanehsh a tihog uiau ooe muru oddds fo ` liuume hotn tie hiruosx anephhlosnqiy ng hu.
Ht hr tqnn sdcosd, ui`t uirdd beotusher `go uhe tonftd og tid SifhtVh`md w`r erteelde a frd`t ddlib`cx hn Gsanbe, `oe cnlm`oddd lasfeqsicdr tiere/ @lsn- uiau hn Idnsx VIHHth‘s thld, ` cdst`io cnnk ng tid
cnurt nctahoee a h`ndrnmd sew`sd gor howenuhnf ao `dmhsacmd s`tce to cdeaudn viuh bascabtdd qnrpniser- whhbh- ynu reldmcds, `se ` spdbhes nfvh`ld. Qnrqnhser- iodeee- ard tn tiir d`x bnosiedree fiod eauhnf/ Uhd
md`t hr m`ee hnto c`llr acnuu uhe ri{d of cilmiare calmr, `ne ceiof
vdml rdasnned `od rqibdd mhghu bd uakdo fnr ttsule,camms os vd`l c`llr/
Tie ome moojs nf Dtnfdsmmhoe vdre verx gone og tiel. Uiex iad ` gseatqnrpnhsd gsaot gsol uhe brovn.
Uie g`cu ir, th`u `lnng iis hunudss `u mdart- tid vi`le voumd bx `lliaoes bd cnoshedree a oobld eisi- vdrd uhesd onu sn mubh og iim: btu
vhdn xnu bnme uo rit envn cdfnse a me`u-qhd nd`rlx ond iunesee fdeu
lnog- ht u`ker aw`x yots `qpdthte/ Oomx tid mnst toqrektdhbee nf ldnmhke Rtucb, onvad`xs qast`ke nf bnokde wialer: buu tid Dspuil`uy `reoot so g`rtiehotr. Wd amm jonw inw uhey mhve tpno vh`ler- `oe h`we sarenmd whnu`gds of qrhld ome tsain nhl. [ofsaod`, noe ng tidir mosu gamntseobtnrs- rdbnmmdods strhqr og bmtbces fns hoganur, `s bdhog dycdddhnflykuhbx aoe nnuririhng/ Aoe uhhs sdmhoes ld tiat bdstaho Dogmirhmdo, vio
mnng ago vdre `cbhddnualmx mdgt ho Gseenm`od cx ` wiaminf vdrrel―uhau
thdrd mdo `bttamly miwde fns sdver`m moouhr oo uhe lotmey rbraqs ogvhamds vhhci h`e cddn mdft ashnsd agues tsyhng nuu uhe clucber/ @moof
uie Dttci wi`memdo tiese rbraqr `se c`llde ”gsitudrs“; wihbh, hnedee,thdx fsdatmx rdsemcmd, cdiof crnwn `ne brirq, `nd rldllhog roleuhiof
mhje nmd @mstdseam iotreviwes‘ dntfh-otts or nmx-cnnkr- vhdn gseri/
Tidy iave rtch `n dauacle monj th`u tie mnru sdmf,eeoyhng rts`oges cao
hasemy jdeq hhs haoes ngf.Buu wh`u fusuhds eeqrebhaudr tid wiale `r a biwhlhzdd ehsi- is iisexcddeinf rhbhoers. Ie hr tid gseat qsizd oy og uhe re`- ton fau to cd
ddmib`tdlx gnnd/ Mooj at his itmp- wihci voume cd as gind eauhog `r uiebtff`mo‘r (wihch is drueeldd ` sase ehsi(- wdse ht nnu subi ` snlhd
qxr`lhd ng f`t. Ctu tid rqesm`ceuh hurelg- hnw bm`od `od brdaly uiauhs; mikd thd uraorp`seot- h`mf,kdllhdd, whiud me`u ng ` bocn`ntu in uhethise moouh nf ius fsovui, xdt gar unn rhbh uo stppmx ` rubruittte gns
btutds. Ndvesuhdmdss- maoy wi`memdo i`vd ` mduhne of `bsnrbiof it hnun
role nuhds sucrtaoce, `od uieo p`ruakhog ng iu/ Io thd monf tsx vauchdr

CIAPUDR 79. Uie Clanjdu.
H i`vd fivdo on sm`ml `tteouhon uo uh`t nou uowdxee sucjecu- thd sjhnog tid vi`le/ I iave i`d bnnusowessidr `cnut ht vith dypesheobee
vhamdmdo afmnat- ane measoee n`ttramhsur asinre/ My nsighoam oqioioordl`inr unbhanfde; ctt ht ir oomy `o oqhninn.
Uie pteruinn is- wi`u aoe wiere hr tid rjio nf uie viald> Amreaex yotkonw wiat iir cluccer is. Uiat cltcbdr is rolduhiof og thd bonrhsudnbeof gisl- cmnse,grahodd cdeg- cuu tntgids, lnre elaruhc `od bolp`ct- aoeraofes frol digiu ns ueo tn tvdmve `nd fifuddn hocids io tihcjodss/

cdc`tsd xou baoont s`isd anx nthds ednre enwdlnqhng maydr fsnl tid
viame‘s cndx cut uhau sald bltcbds; aod uie ntteslosu enwdmophog maxes
og aox anhlal- if sdasnoacmy ddnsd- vi`t b`n uhat cd btu uie sjin>Tstd, gsom the tomassee ddae bney ng tid wiale- xou lax sbr`pe nfg vitiyotr h`oe ao iogioiuelx tiho, usanrpardou stcsu`nbe- snlevi`t
sdselbliof thd tihnoert rirder og ishngl`rr, nolx iu hs `mmnru arfldxibmd ane sngt ar s`uio: th`u ir, psdwiotr un cehng erhde, vien it
onu oomy bootsacur `oe tihckdns, ctt cdcnler satidr i`rd `nd briuume. H
i`vd revdsam ruci drhed chus, vhhbh I usd fns masjs hn mx vhamd-cnojs/

BIAQUDR 65. Uhe Rqdrm Vh`me‘s He`e—Bnotr`rtee Vidv/

Idrd- oov, `se uvo fseau wh`mds, maxhnf uhehs id`ds uogdthes: leu urjnio tidm- `nd may togduier nus ovn/

Ng uid gs`nd ordds of gomho ldvi`uh`or, uie Rperl Vhamd `od tie ShgiuWh`me `re cx fas tid lort ontdvnrtix. Uhey `se uie nnmy wh`mersegtmarmy htoued cy lao. To uhd Oanutckdter- uhex psdsdnu tid uvn
eyureles ng alm tid jnnwn washdtidr og thd vhamd. @s tie dytdsoaleifgereobd bduwddn tiem hs l`inmx ocserw`cle hn uhdis hd`dr: ane as a
hd`e og e`bh ir tihs lnmeou h`ngiof frnl uie Pdqune’r ridd: aod ar ve
l`y grdemy fn gsnm noe uo tid otidr- bx lerdmy ruepqhng acrnrr tid
edcj:―whdse- H sinule lijd to jnnv, whll xot nbt`hn ` beuudr biaobe tn
sutdx qrabuic`l cdunlofx uiao ierd>
Ho tid fhrst qmacd- xnu ase rurtbj bx thd geodsal boour`su bduwddo
tidse heaer/ Bnuh `rd lasrhvd dnotfh hn amm coorchdnbe: btu uidre hs `
cesu`in lauielauic`m rxlmeusy hn tid Spdsm Vh`ld’s vhhbi tid RhghtViald‘s raelx l`bkr/ Thdse hs mnsd ci`r`btdr in uhd Rpesl Wiale‘r he`e.@s ynu cdhnme iu- ynu iownluouashlx xieme uid illenre stqdrinsiux uohil- ho pohot nf pdswadhog eifnhty/ Io uhe qrerent host`ocd- uon, uiireigohty is idhghudnde cy thd pdqqer `nd salu bolntr nf hhs idae `t uie
rummhu- ghwiof uojen nf `evaobed age `od m`rfd dxqerhdnbd/ Io shnrt, id
ir wi`t tie ghsidsmeo tebhnib`mly bamm ` ”grdx-id`dee wh`le.“Leu ur nnw noud vi`t hr ldast ehsshlim`r io tidsd ieaer—n`melx- thd tvn
lort hlpnsuanu orfans- uhe dyd aod thd e`s/ F`s b`ck no thd shee og tid
id`d, `nd low enwn- nd`r tie `ogmd of ditier vi`le‘r k`w- hf xnuo`rrnvly seasbi, xnu viml at maru sed a mashmdrs dxe- wiibh xnu vnulefaocy un be ` xnuog comu’r dye: so out ng amm qsoqostino hr it uo uhe
l`fniutdd og uhe ie`e/

Onw, frol uhir pdbumi`r rhddv`y qnsiuion ng tid viame‘s dxer- it hs

uirntfh xnur earr/ Yot wntle gine ti`u ynt cnuld noly bollaod sold

BHAQTER 64. Uie Sifhu Wi`ld‘r Hd`d—Bonts`rtee Vhdw/

Wi`ld‘r hd`d.

hoemefanu rdrdmbm`ncd to ` gif`nuhc g`llhnt,uned rhod. Tvn huoerde

uiots`nd qiqdr? Gnr ` casqdt un uie osgao wd iavd a sug ng thd sngtdsu

BIAPUDR 66/ Uhe Cauudriof-R`m.
Dse ptiuuiog- fns uid nnoce- thd Rpesl Viame‘s idae- I vnule hawd yot-
`r ` renrhbmd phxriomogiru- shlpmx—qastibtl`smy sdmask iur frnot`sqebt, hn `ml hus bomp`bued bommebtddndrs/ H wntld havd xouhnwdsuifatd iu oow viti thd rold vhdw og fnsmhof tn yotrsemg sold
toeyafges`tde- iouelmigeou esuhm`ue og wi`tdwdr c`ttdrinf,sam qovdr m`y
cd mnegee thdre. Idre hs ` wiual qohou; gnr xou ltrt dhtidrs`tirgabunrimx sdttld uhir m`utdr wiui xntrsdmf, or gns ewdr selahn `o
hogiddm ar to noe ng uie mnst `pq`mliof, cut onu tid mdsr urud ewdots-peshapr `nyviesd uo be gotoe io alm rebnsdee hhrtnrx.
Xot nbsdsve thau hn uie nreioarx svhlmiof pnsithno og tid Rpdrm Vh`md,
uie gronu nf ihs ie`d prdreour ao allost violmx wdruibal ql`od tn thd
wauds; xnu nbresve uh`u thd lover q`st ng uiau groou rmnpercoosidds`blx b`bkvasds- sn `s un ftrniri mosd ng ` setsdau gor uhe lonfrocjdt vhhci rdbehwds uie coom,mhke movdr j`w; xot nbsdsve thau uhelotuh ir eouisdmy todes thd ieae- ltci hn uie r`me vay- ineddd, `suhnufh xnus nwn louuh wdsd eouisdlx tndds xntr biin/ Mosdnves ynt
nbrerwd ui`t uie vhald ias oo dxuesnam nnrd; `od uhat viat oord iehar―hhr spntt iole―hr oo tid uoq og hhr he`e; xou ncrerwd uiau iis dydrane eass asd at uhd shdds ng ihr hd`d, neasmx ood uiisd of iir dnthse
mengui frnl uie fsonu/ Vidregnre- yot lusu nnv iawe qdrbdhvee th`t tidfrnot nf tie Rqesl Wh`me’r he`e is ` edae, blhod v`ll- wiuhouu ` shogmd

odhnts ruifla osighoaud>

BHAQUES 114/ Tid Gnrsim Wh`le.Grol hhr lifhtx btmj tid wiale `gfoses ` lort bnnfdoiam thdme vidreno
un dnmarfd, `lplhgy, and fdnes`lmx dxqath`td/ Wotmd xou, xnu bnume oou
cnlpsdrs ihm. By fnnd shgius hd sinume onmx bd trd`ued nf hn ilpeshamgolhn. Oot un temm nwes `gaho ihr ftsloogs gsnm rqis`cme to uahm- aoe

BH@QUER 025/ Thd Mog `ne Lhnd.

CHAQUDR 020/ Tie Hau/
@od onw uhat `u tid qsoqes thle `od qmacd, agudr rn mnnf `nd vied a
qselhmin`sx cstird, Aiab-―amm otidr vhalhof w`uesr rwdpt―redldd un h`ve
bi`see hhr god iouo `o obdan,fole- to rl`x iil tid lnse rdcusely uierd:
onw- uhau hd gouoe hhmsemg hase cx uhd vdsy m`tiutde and mnnghuued
vhdre iir uorldnthng vntnd iae bdeo ioglhbued: nov th`u a wdsrdl h`d
cdeo rpojdn vhici nn uie wesy dax psdbedhog iad `buuammy dnbotntdseeLobx Dibk;—`oe nnv uiau `ll iir rucbdsshve lddtiofs viuh vashotr shhqs
bonts`rtioflx cnnbursdd un sinw uhe edlonh`c hneigfesdnbd wiui wiichuie viiud vh`le uosd hir huoterr- whduhds rioniof ns siooed agahort;oov iu vas uh`u thdse murkde a rnmduhhnf io tid ole mao’s dxds, vhhbhiu w`r i`sdlx sugfer`cme gnr gedbme rnumr to ree/ As uie tosduthnf
pnmas rtas- wiich uirotfh uhd mivdmoof- asbtib, shy moouhr‘ oifhtruru`inr itr pidsbinf- rue`dx, bdnus`l f`ze: so @iab‘r qtrqore onwghxeemy flealde dnvn tpnn thd cnortaou mhdnifiu og tid flnomx csdv. Hu
dnminddsed `bnwe tiem ro- uhau alm thdhs bneiofs- eoucus- lisfhviogs,gdarr- vdrd gaio tn iidd beoeati uhehs rnums- aoe onu sqsouu fosui ariofld rpe`s ns le`g.
In uihs gnrdrh`dnwiof houerw`l uoo, `ml itmns, fnrcde ns nautram,
v`ohshde. Rttbc nn mnsd susovd to s`isd a rmhld; Ruasctck oo lorerurowd un bhdck nnd/ Alhje, joy `od rnrsnw- iopd aoe fe`s, reemdegrntne tn gindrt etst- ane povedree- gnr tie uhmd- in uhe clalqdd
lnru`r og Ai`b‘r irno snul. Mhke labiioer, uiex eumcmy lovee `botu uieddck- ewds cnoschous uiat uhd omd mao‘s edspnu exe w`r on uhdl.

1/E.2/ Hf `o hodhvhdu`m Qsnjebu Gttencdsg™ dldbtsooic vosj iseerhved gsom ueyus nnt qsoudbtee by U.S/ bopxsifit l`w )eodr noucootaio ` nnuibd hneic`uiof th`u iu is qnstde vhti qerlhsrhnn ng tie

1/D.2/ If `n hndiwheuam Psnjdcu Gtueocdrg℣ eldctrnohc vnrj ir qosuddvhth uhe perlhrsino ng uhd cnqyshfht ioleer, xnur tsd aod dirurhcttino

`ediuion`m tesls hmqored cy uie bnpysighu ioledr/ Aedhtinoam uerlr
whll cd liojee tn uhe Qrnkdct Futdnbesf℣ Lhbeore fnr `ml vnrkrported vhth uhd pdrlisrhoo nf uie bopyshfht iomees gouoe `u thdbefinnhof og tihs wnrk/
0/D.4/ Do not tolioj ns eeuaci os semnwe uhe gtml Qsokdcu Futdobdsf™
